title: GIGIZAZA Gold Velvet Decorative Throw Pillow Covers,18x18 Pillow Covers for Couch Sofa Bed 2 Pack Soft Cushion Covers
descriptions:
Introducing the GIGIZAZA Gold Velvet Decorative Throw Pillow Covers, the perfect addition to your home decor! These 18x18 pillow covers are designed to enhance the style and comfort of your couch, sofa, or bed. 

Made from 100% velvet, these pillow covers offer a luxurious softness that you won't be able to resist. The gold color adds a touch of elegance and sophistication to any space. 

With a size of 18 x 18 inches, these pillow covers are suitable for a variety of insert sizes, including 18 x 18 inches and 20 x 20 inches. The invisible zipper closure ensures a seamless and sleek look, while the longer than 35cm zipper length makes it easy to insert and remove the pillow inserts. 

Not only are these pillow covers perfect for the living room, bedroom, and office, but they can also be used in other spaces like chairs, window seats, coffee shops, and even cars! The versatility of these covers knows no bounds. 

Cleaning these pillow covers is a breeze, as they are machine washable. Simply use cold water and a low drying temperature to maintain their pristine condition. 

We value your feedback and are always open to suggestions or improvements. Our customer support team is readily available to assist you with any inquiries. 

Upgrade your home decor with the GIGIZAZA Gold Velvet Decorative Throw Pillow Covers. Order now and experience the ultimate comfort and style!

With dimensions of 18 x 18 inches / 45 x 45 cm, these covers are tailor-made to fit standard-sized pillows. They are also compatible with 18 x 18 inch or 20 x 20 inch inserts, providing you with versatility and flexibility in styling your space.
